CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Final Design Approval stage positioned above or below the Testing and Validation stage?
SRP.A: The Final Design Approval stage is positioned {below} the Testing and Validation stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Market Release?
VE.A: The value of stage Market Release is {20%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Testing and Validation?
VE.A: The value of stage Testing and Validation is {100%}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Production?
VE.A: The value of stage Production is {43%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Testing and Validation, with a value of {100%}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Market Release, with a value of {20%}.

SC.Q: What is the percentage reduction from stage Final Design Approval to stage Production?
SC.A: The percentage reduction from stage Final Design Approval to stage Production is {29%}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 86%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 31%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 10% and 86%? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Final Design Approval} stage has {72%}, the {Production} stage has {43%}, the {Market Release} stage has {20%}.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Testing and Validation to Final Design Approval, or from stage Final Design Approval to Production?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Final Design Approval} to {Production} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Production to Market Release, or from stage Final Design Approval to Production?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Final Design Approval} to {Production} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Final Design Approval to Production, from stage Testing and Validation to Final Design Approval, or from stage Production to Market Release?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Final Design Approval} to stage {Production} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Final Design Approval} and {Production} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Production} and {Market Release} stages.
